name: LoopyPong
description:
You have to destroy the enemy spaceship, by bouncing back it’s bullets back at it!

How To Play
  • Move with the mouse
  • Hold left click to stop
  • stay on the green part of the circle
  • avoid the spaceship when it goes out on the circle
  • bounce back the bullets by getting in fromt of them
  • if you stay off of the green segment or the spaceship touches you, you lose
Tools used
  • Godot 3.2.3 Mono
  • Aseprite
  • Paint.net
  • Bosca Ceoil
  • ChipTone
  • ScreenToGif
